amendment.description: To authorize a study on the suitability and feasibility of designating the National D-Day Memorial in Bedford, Virginia, as a unit of the National Park System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1751 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8025-8029; text: CR S8027) To authorize a study on the suitability and feasibility of designating the National D-Day Memorial in Bedford, Virginia, as a unit of the National Park System.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1751 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
